name: Web UI
body:
A Vanilla JavaScript Web Component Library with an optional Rust WebAssembly plugin.

This framework is being developed and used to power all of Stoic Dreams' in-house website projects and our Task Proxy desktop application.

name: My Fidelity
body: Developer portal for accessing and managing My Fidelity API tools and content delivery services offered by Stoic Dreams.

name: Gassler Design
body: Company website for Gassler Design, interior design specialists with a focus on providing inspiring visualizations through 3d renderings.

name: Task Proxy
body: Task Proxy is our desktop application that is being designed to allow developers to manage code documenation and scripts, speed up workflows, and simplify collaboration with other developers.

name: Task Story
body: Task Story is our Project Management tool that provides a guided workflow to organize projects with a Problem / Solution architecture.

name: Did You Hear About This Job?
body:
Job Search resources and tips.

Currently rebuilding as part of migration to Web UI.
